course_title: Critical Writing in Hispanic Topics: In Sickness and in Health
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 15 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
In this course we will read and discuss a range of literary and cultural texts from the Spanish-speaking world with a thematic focus on health and medicine, with particular attention to the ways in which notions of health and wellbeing, illness and disease, and therapeutic practices and beliefs are culturally constructed and situated. Our primary learning objective will be to appreciate how careful reading of literary and cultural texts provides insights into our experiences as patients, caregivers and practitioners. Taught in Spanish using Para vivir con salud https://opentext.ku.edu/paravivir/.
Prerequisite: One 300-level foundational course.
course_description: This course combines advanced writing instruction with the study of diverse Hispanic cultural topics.
